The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 13 April is 269,471 (31,058.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 08 April, there were 4,094 new confirmed cases (471.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 April, there were 6,861 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 40% (2,767 fewer cases).
